TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StickyNoteControl extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
Public NotInheritable Class StickyNoteControl Inherits Control
public ref class StickyNoteControl sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Control

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件允许用户在文档中附加键入的文本或手写的批注。

span.span: Represents a control that lets users attach typed text or handwritten annotations to documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 粘滞便笺提供其内容与注释锚定的文本、图像或其他材料分离的矩形区域。A sticky note provides a rectangular area whose content is separate from the text, image, or other material to which the note is anchored. 类及其成员是公共的, 因此可以对其进行样式化, 但没有公共构造函数。The class and its members are public so that it can be styled, but is no public constructor. 实例是用 类的和创建的。Instances are created with the and of the class. 创建粘滞便笺时, 会将其指定为以下两种类型之一:When a sticky note is created, it is designated as one of two types: - **文本**粘滞便笺的内容区域可以像任何其他丰富文本区域一样进行书写和编辑。**Text** sticky notes have a content area that can be written and edited like any other Rich Text area. 用户可以键入它, 还可以在注释内以及便笺与其他应用程序之间剪切、复制和粘贴。Users can type into it and can also cut, copy, and paste both within the note and between the note and other applications. 还可以将图像粘贴到便笺中。Images can also be pasted into the note. 常用的富文本键盘快捷方式也可用。The usual Rich Text keyboard shortcuts are also available. - **墨**粘滞便笺具有内容区域, 可以像其他墨迹 canvasses 一样进行编辑。**Ink** sticky notes have an content area and it can be edited like other ink canvasses. 例如, 可以清除笔划。For example, strokes can be erased. 在 tablet PC 或其他合适的硬件上, 用户可以输入手写笔记。With a tablet PC or other suitable hardware, users can enter handwritten notes. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 是的,它是一种更有效的方式来批注材料,而不是标记硬拷贝或使用物理手写笔记。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the makes it a more powerful way to annotate material than marking up a hardcopy or using physical handwritten notes. 它还比简单地添加或通过文档文本更灵活。It is also more flexible than simply adding to, or striking through, the text of a document. - 可以调整粘滞便笺的大小。Sticky notes can be resized. - 粘滞便笺可以最小化为图标并展开。Sticky notes can be minimized to an icon and expanded. - 最大化时, 可以将粘滞便笺拖动到窗口中的新位置, 而无需更改其定位点的位置。When maximized, a sticky note can be dragged to a new position in a window without changing the location of its anchor. - 粘滞便笺适用的确切内容将突出显示, 并使用括号将其标记为 off。The exact content to which a sticky note applies is highlighted and marked off with brackets. - 两个或多个粘滞便笺可应用于相同内容或重叠内容。Two or more sticky notes can apply to the same content or to overlapping content. - 当粘滞便笺锚定的文档内容中发生更改时, 粘滞便笺的位置相对于它所绑定到的内容移动到位置。When change occurs within the document content to which a sticky note is anchored, the sticky note's position moves in position relative to the content to which it was bound. - 文本粘滞便笺会自动换行。With text sticky notes, lines will wrap automatically. 如果调整了便笺的大小, 则会根据需要重新包装线条。If the note is resized, lines will re-wrap as needed. 如果内容超出了便笺的底部, 将显示一个垂直滚动条。If content extends below the bottom of the note, a vertical scroll bar will appear. - 当内容超出注释边界时, 将显示垂直滚动条和水平滚动条。With ink sticky notes, vertical and horizontal scroll bars will appear whenever content extends beyond the boundaries of the note. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将中的菜单命令配置为执行类和 。The following example shows how menu commands in a can be configured to execute the and of the class. 该示例演示如何将 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 文档读入控件中, 然后启用对添加用户创建的粘滞便笺的支持。The example shows how to read an XML Paper Specification (XPS) document into a control and then enable support for adding user-created sticky notes. [!code-xaml[DocViewerAnnotationsXps#CreateDeleteAnnotations](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocViewerAnnotationsXps/CSharp/Window1.xaml#createdeleteannotations)]

span.span: An object that provides information about the annotated object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够将粘滞便笺与相应的批注对象进行匹配。This property enables you to match the sticky note with the corresponding annotated object. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时, 将采用类型为的参数。When used, the takes a parameter of type . 命令的方法会将光标置于由参数指定的模式下。The command's method will put the cursor in the mode specified by the parameter.
